metadata.name: HackTool - Htran/NATBypass Execution
metadata.comment: Detects executable names or flags used by Htran or Htran-like tools (e.g. NATBypass)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\htran.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\lcx.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe -tran ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe -slave '))))

output.summary: Detects executable names or flags used by Htran or Htran-like tools (e.g. NATBypass)

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown References: https://github.com/HiwinCN/HTran, https://github.com/cw1997/NATBypass
